what: Validate a vector of ISINs — is_valid_isin
title: Validate a vector of ISINs — is_valid_isin
text: function validates vector ISINs valid codes conform ISO 6166 specification TRUE FALSE. checks basic structure (2 alpha characters, 9 alpha-numeric characters, 1 check digit) also validates check digit using Luhn algorithm.

title: Validate a vector of ISINs — is_valid_isin
